name: css-width-scale
description: Css module of single purpose classes for width scale

scripts.start: tachyons src/css-width-scale.css > css/css-width-scale.css && tachyons src/css-width-scale.css --minify > css/css-width-scale.min.css && tachyons src/css-width-scale.css --generate-docs --package=../../package.json > readme.md
